channel.description: NFS Review Questions \ Q. The name of the AutoFS service daemon is autofs. True or False? A. False. The name of the AutoFS service daemon is automount. Q. What would the line entry /dir1 *(rw) in the /etc/exports file mean? A. The line entry would export /dir1 in read/write mode to all systems. Q. What type of AutoFS map would have the /- /etc/auto.media entry in the auto.master file? A. A direct map.
